property_title: Apartment in Alanya Close to Cleopatra Beach - CLEOPATRA SARAY 13
property_description:
A Residence in Alanya That Puts You Steps Away from Cleopatra Beach

When people search for property in Alanya, the first names that come up are usually Mahmutlar, Kestel, or Oba. These districts are indeed popular, but nothing compares to living within walking distance ofCleopatra Beach— the most famous stretch of sand on Turkey’s southern coast. In this neighborhood, the sea, the city, and the lifestyle all come together.

Believe us, Cleopatra Beach was not named after Cleopatra for nothing! Here,you can live like a queen!

Within this setting,Cleopatra Saray 13offers a2 room apartment of 45 m², completed in2023and now available as aresale unit. It sits just400 meters from the beach, oriented toward the northwest, and designed for both comfort and practicality.

Apartment Interior and Layout

Though compact in size, the apartment uses its45 m²efficiently. The open-plan living area connects the kitchen and the lounge, creating a sociable environment. Wide windows allow natural light throughout the day, while thenorthwest orientationkeeps the interior cooler during summer months — a detail many buyers appreciate in Alanya’s warm climate.

Thebedroomoffers enough space for built-in wardrobes and a comfortable bed setup, while the bathroom comes with amodern shower cabin and electric water heater. Tile flooring, neutral wall finishes, and practical layouts ensure the home can easily be personalized with your own furniture and decoration.

This property comes as aresale unityet feels brand new, thanks to its recent construction in 2023.

Facilities Within Cleopatra Saray 13

The residence reflects themodern living concept of Alanya’s city center. While apartments near Cleopatra Beach often belong to older buildings, Saray 13 delivers a fresh and complete complex atmosphere.

Facilities include:

  • Outdoor swimming poolfor warm summer days

  • Jacuzzi and saunafor relaxation

  • Fitness roomto maintain a healthy routine

  • Barbecue areafor social gatherings

  • Caretaker servicefor daily maintenance

  • 24/7 camera systemensuring security

  • Cable TV and satellite infrastructure

These communal features add value to the property and make it appealing not only for living but also for rental purposes.

Location Advantages — The Heart of Alanya’s Western Side

The western side of Alanya combines arelaxed lifestyle with strong urban amenities. Streets are lined with cafes, restaurants, and international shops, yet the vibe remains easy-going. You will find neighbors from many different countries, creating a welcoming and multicultural atmosphere.

The highlight is, of course,Cleopatra Beach, stretching for kilometers and offering every type of activity:

  • Water sportssuch as jet skiing, parasailing, and paddleboarding

  • Beach clubswith concerts, events, and lively nightlife

  • Cycling and walking pathsalong the coastline

  • Local markets and fish restaurants, perfect for fresh produce and seafood

Public transport connections are excellent. The district hasone of the richest bus networks in Alanya, and taxis are always available on main streets. Theintercity bus terminalis also nearby, making weekend trips to Antalya or Gazipaşa easy.

In addition to the beach, you haveNew Marina, Ulaş Beach, Konaklı, and even theancient city of Hamaxiajust a few kilometers away. Whether you prefer history, adventure, or simply relaxing by the sea, the area delivers it all.

Lifestyle in Cleopatra District

Living in Cleopatra means combiningtouristic vibrancy with everyday practicality. You can walk to supermarkets, bakeries, and the central bazaar for daily needs, or explore stylish cafes for a more social lifestyle. The area also featuresAlanya’s Olympic indoor swimming pool, sports facilities, and countless restaurants offering both local and international cuisines.

The neighborhood balances local character with modern convenience, making it attractive not only for tourists but also for year-round residents.

Investment Potential and Rental Income

Buying an apartment nearCleopatra Beachis always a solid investment. Properties in this area have ahigh rental potential, especially during the summer months when demand from international tourists peaks.

Short-term rentals bring strong returns thanks to the location, while long-term rentals attract digital nomads, couples, or retirees who prefer to live in central Alanya. The fact that thedistrict remains open for residence permit applicationsfurther increases its appeal to foreign buyers seeking a legal stay in Turkey.

As aresale unit, this property is available forcash purchase with possible discount options, offering value compared to new projects that often come at higher prices.

Who Should Consider This Apartment?

  • Investors: Strong short-term rental demand ensures solid returns.

  • Young professionals or couples: A practical city apartment within walking distance of the beach and all amenities.

  • Retirees: Comfortable size, easy maintenance, and central location without the need for a car.

Thehotsale listingmakes it an attractive opportunity for anyone seeking to secure a place near Cleopatra Beach quickly.

Why Work with Luxury Estate Turkey?

Buying property in a foreign country can feel overwhelming. At Luxury Estate Turkey, we simplify the process and providerealistic, trustworthy guidanceevery step of the way.

Here’s what sets us apart:

  • Market Expertise
    We know the Alanya property market inside out. Our advice is based on facts and years of experience.

  • Full Legal & Residency Support
    From notary procedures toresidence permit and Turkish citizenship applications, our team ensures smooth paperwork.

  • Multilingual Communication
    We speak your language. Clear, transparent communication is at the center of our service.

  • After-Sales Services
    From furnishing your new apartment to connecting utilities, we remain by your side even after the purchase.

  • Flexible Solutions
    Cash discounts, property swaps, or investment strategies — we help you find the right deal.

Choosing us means more than buying a property; it means securing your place in Turkey with confidence, clarity, and long-term support.

If you are ready to own an apartment near Cleopatra Beach,contact Luxury Estate Turkey today.

We can arrange a viewing, share further investment details, or even organize aninspection tripso you can experience the property and the neighborhood firsthand.

property_title: Natural Gas Installed 2 Room Apartment For Sale in Alanya
property_description:
Modern Apartment for Sale in Güneş Residence, Alanya – Natural Gas Installed

Looking for aproperty in Alanyawith full modern infrastructure and long-term living potential? This well-appointed 2-room apartment inGüneş Residence, located in the Çıplaklı district of Alanya, is now available for sale.

What makes this listing especially unique is the inclusion ofnatural gas infrastructure— a rare and valuable feature in Alanya. The apartment already has itsnatural gas boiler and radiators installed, offering immediate usability and comfort during cooler months. This places the unit within alimited zone in Alanyawhere natural gas access is supported by the municipality.

Apartment Features and Layout

This functional and sunlit apartment is designed to serve as an ideal living space for individuals, couples, or investors seeking strong rental appeal.

  • Total Area:60 square meters

  • Room Distribution:2 rooms including a spacious living area and separate room (suitable for bedroom or flexible use)

  • Floor:3rd floor with open views

  • Orientation:South-East facing — enjoy abundant natural light and a pleasant breeze throughout the day

  • Views:City, mountain, and internal site views from multiple windows

  • Condition:Move-in ready, including natural gas system, water heater, and installed radiators

In addition, the layout supports both short-term stays and full-time residential living, with practical indoor comfort supported by full site infrastructure.

Güneş Residence – Site Features and Amenities

The apartment is part of the Güneş Residence complex, which is known for its family-friendly design, strong maintenance, and well-planned shared spaces.

On-Site Amenities Include:

  • Outdoor Swimming Pool

  • Children’s Pool

  • Fitness Center

  • Garden Pergola (Kamelya)

  • Playground for Kids

  • Open Parking Area

  • Secure Building with Elevator

  • Basement Storage Room

  • Site Caretaker

  • Cable TV and Satellite Infrastructure

  • 24/7 Security Camera System

Thanks to these features, daily life is both convenient and enjoyable, whether you’re planning to live year-round or rent the property for passive income.

Location: Çıplaklı District of Alanya

Çıplaklıis a developing residential area located northeast of Alanya center. Unlike the coastal zones focused mainly on seasonal tourism, Çıplaklı attracts long-term residents who prioritize comfort, accessibility, and infrastructure.

What Makes Çıplaklı Ideal?

  • Easy access to theAlanya ring roadand central districts

  • Short drive to local hospitals, schools, and shopping centers

  • Quiet residential streets with low traffic

  • Growing infrastructure with newly built residential projects

  • Cooler breezes in summer due to higher elevation

Moreover, Çıplaklı is one of thefew districts in Alanyathat supportnatural gas infrastructure, making it ideal for those planning full-time residence or who prefer modern heating systems over electric solutions.

What Makes This Property Stand Out

This apartment has several standout features that make it an ideal choice for buyers with long-term goals:

  • Fully installednatural gas system(boiler and radiators)

  • Located withina municipality-approved gas-supported zone

  • Investment-friendly: attractive for long-term renters or resale

  • Bright southeast exposure for year-round comfort

  • Discount opportunity available forcash payment

  • Low maintenance fees within a well-kept residential complex

  • Quiet, residential atmosphere away from tourist noise

Thanks to the combination of layout, location, and infrastructure, this apartment is suitable for both homeowners and investors looking to enter theAlanya real estatemarket with a practical, ready-to-use unit.

Who Is This Property Suitable For?

This apartment meets the needs of:

  • First-time buyers seeking affordable yet modern housing

  • Families or individuals looking for a long-term home

  • Investors focused on rental income in local neighborhoods

  • Retirees who prefer calm, accessible surroundings

  • Buyers prioritizing energy efficiency and gas heating

Furthermore, the limited number of gas-supported buildings in Alanya increases the long-term value of properties like this.

We Understand Your Priorities – Let’s Find the Right Fit

AtLuxury Estate Turkey, we believe that buying property should be more than a transaction — it should feel right. That’s why we take time to understand what truly matters to you.

Whether you're seeking a peaceful home with proper heating, or a smart investment with low-risk potential, we ensure full transparency, local expertise, and personalized attention at every step.

From virtual tours to legal checks, we stand by you — offering honest answers, real numbers, and tailored service. We don’t just help you buy a property; we help you make the right decision for your lifestyle, your future, and your peace of mind.

Want to Visit or Learn More?

If you’re interested in thissoutheast-facing apartment with natural gasin Alanya’s Çıplaklı district, get in touch today.

We can arrange:

  • Video or in-person tours

  • Additional photos and layout plans

  • Guidance on legal and financial procedures

  • Price negotiation and payment planning

  • Assistance with utility setup and after-sale services

This apartment offers a rare combination of location, infrastructure, and affordability — don’t miss your chance to own a future-proof home in one of Alanya’s most livable neighborhoods.

property_title: Family Apartment with Separate Kitchen in Alanya
property_description:
Furnished 3 Room Apartment for Sale in Mahmutlar – 115 m² with Separate Kitchen and Family-Oriented Design

If you are searching for a spacious and well-plannedapartment for sale in Alanya Mahmutlar, this 115 m² furnished flat offers a perfect blend of comfort, functionality, and warm interior touches. With a separate kitchen, a fully enclosed balcony, and a classical yet cozy decoration style, the property suits families, long-term residents, and investors who want a ready-to-move option in one of Alanya’s most popular districts.

Mahmutlar – A Balanced District Between Local Living and Tourism

Mahmutlar is a district that stretches along the Mediterranean coastline, framed by sandy beaches on one side and the foothills of the Taurus Mountains on the other. This duality gives the neighborhood a distinctive atmosphere: the calm of nature meets the vibrancy of a modern residential town. Located only 10 km from Alanya city center, Mahmutlar combines everyday convenience with a holiday spirit.

Moreover, the district has developed into an expat-friendly community where international residents live side by side with locals. You will find foreign-owned cafes, family-run Turkish restaurants, and international chains all within walking distance. Salı Pazarı (the Tuesday market) is a highlight, offering fresh fruits, vegetables, spices, and traditional textiles every week.

Transportation is easy and frequent. Local minibuses circulate within Mahmutlar and towards Kargıcak, while buses to Alanya center depart every 10 minutes. Taxis are readily available on every corner. For shopping, residents enjoy Yekta Mall and Akdeniz Park shopping centers, while small butchers, bakeries, and hardware stores cover daily needs across the district.

Furthermore, Mahmutlar offers a lifestyle tailored to both leisure and activity. The beachfront is perfect for swimming and water sports, while the mountains at the back invite you for hiking, cycling, or weekend picnics. Fitness centers, hamams, and yoga studios add to the variety, making the area equally suitable for retirees, digital nomads, and families with children.

Apartment Layout – Spacious, Functional, and Full of Light

This3 room apartment in Mahmutlarspans 115 m², which provides a larger footprint than the typical properties in the area. The layout emphasizes family living with clearly defined zones:

  • Living Room:A welcoming space decorated with beige and brown sofas arranged in a comfortable, family-friendly setup. A glass-topped coffee table with golden details adds elegance, while the TV unit, combining white and wood, creates a practical focal point. The yellow accent wall not only brings warmth but also balances the neutral tones of the furniture.

  • Kitchen:Unlike many newer builds, this property comes with a separate kitchen—an advantage for buyers who prefer to keep cooking and living spaces apart. Cabinets combine classical brown frames with white doors, while the marble-effect countertop ensures durability and style. Decorative textiles and small details give the kitchen a homely atmosphere.

  • Bedrooms:The master bedroom follows a calm pastel palette, with a classical bedframe, matching headboard, and nightstands. The second bedroom is arranged more minimally with a single bed and white furniture, making it suitable for a child, guest, or even a home office setup.

  • Balcony:A highlight of this apartment is the large enclosed balcony. Glazed from floor to ceiling, it can be used year-round as a winter garden. Currently arranged with a swing, sofa, and table, the balcony doubles as an extra living area where families can enjoy tea in the evenings or quiet breakfasts on sunny mornings.

In total, the design combines traditional comfort with modern practicality. The choice of textiles, carpets, and curtains reflects Turkish home culture, but the overall look remains adaptable. With small updates—such as lighter rugs or modern lighting fixtures—the interior can be easily refreshed to match contemporary tastes.

Complex Facilities – Everyday Comfort at Your Doorstep

The residence provides a safe and well-maintained environment with features designed for both relaxation and daily needs.

  • Outdoor Pool:A central pool where residents can swim, sunbathe, or enjoy social moments during the long summer season.

  • Children’s Pool and Garden:Families benefit from safe play areas and green spaces for outdoor activities.

  • Barbecue Zone:Perfect for weekend gatherings with friends and neighbors.

  • Caretaker Services:A resident caretaker ensures maintenance, cleanliness, and security throughout the year.

  • 24/7 Camera System:Adds an extra layer of safety for peace of mind.

  • Elevator and Parking:Daily practicality is guaranteed, whether you live here permanently or visit seasonally.

Consequently, the complex functions like a small community where neighbors know each other and social facilities enhance daily living.

Location Advantages – Accessibility and Lifestyle Combined

Living in this Mahmutlar apartment means you have beaches, cafes, and shops all within walking distance. The sea is just a short stroll away, giving residents daily access to the Mediterranean coast. Meanwhile, bus connections bring you to Alanya center in less than 15 minutes, making it easy to enjoy both the city’s lively atmosphere and Mahmutlar’s calm environment.

Additionally, the proximity to Kargıcak and Kestel expands your lifestyle options. Kargıcak is known for its greener, quieter atmosphere, while Kestel offers riverside walks and quick routes into Alanya University area.

Investment Potential – Rental Income and Long-Term Value

This furnished3 room apartment in Mahmutlarpresents a smart investment for several reasons:

  1. High Rental Demand:Mahmutlar remains one of the top districts for foreign tenants seeking long-term rentals. Its expat community, international schools, and proximity to the sea ensure year-round occupancy.

  2. Short-Term Holiday Rentals:The enclosed balcony, large size, and family-oriented design appeal to seasonal tourists who prefer apartment stays over hotels.

  3. Resale Value:With its separate kitchen and 115 m² size, the property stands out from smaller, newer builds. This uniqueness helps preserve long-term value.

  4. Citizenship & Residence Permit Eligibility:Depending on purchase price and legal framework, the property can support Turkish residence permits or, in combined investments, citizenship applications—an attractive option for foreign buyers.

Therefore, whether your focus is rental income, capital appreciation, or a personal residence, this apartment checks all the boxes.

Who Will Enjoy This Apartment Most?

  • Families:The spacious rooms, separate kitchen, and secure complex make it ideal for raising children.

  • Retirees:The calm atmosphere of Mahmutlar, easy access to shops, and year-round balcony comfort create a stress-free lifestyle.

  • Digital Nomads:With good internet infrastructure and cafes nearby, remote workers can balance work and leisure in an inspiring Mediterranean setting.

  • Investors:The property’s size, facilities, and location guarantee high liquidity and profitability in both short and long term.

Why Choose Luxury Estate Turkey as Your Trusted Partner?

Buying property abroad requires not just finding the right home, but also navigating paperwork, cultural differences, and long-term planning.Luxury Estate Turkeyprovides the professional guidance and security every buyer deserves.

Here’s what you can expect from our team:

  • Transparent Advice:We set realistic expectations and guide you honestly about the market, pricing, and potential.

  • Local Expertise:With years of experience in the Alanya region, we know the neighborhoods, legal frameworks, and investment trends inside out.

  • Full Legal & Logistical Support:From title deed transfer to residence permit or citizenship procedures, our multilingual team handles the details for you.

  • After-Sale Services:We stay connected after your purchase, assisting with furnishing, rentals, bill payments, and property management.

  • Creative Solutions:Trade-in options, inspection trips, and personalized property tours make your journey smoother.

Ultimately, working with us means you invest securely, avoid common pitfalls, and maximize both lifestyle and profitability.

Final Thoughts – A Spacious and Warm Home in Mahmutlar

Thisfurnished 3 room apartment for sale in Mahmutlarrepresents a rare opportunity: 115 m² of space, a separate kitchen, an enclosed balcony, and a welcoming interior ready for family life. Surrounded by a well-equipped complex and a lively yet peaceful neighborhood, the property balances tradition and modernity, leisure and practicality.

If you are looking for ahome in Alanyathat feels both authentic and functional, this apartment deserves your attention. Schedule your viewing today and discover how this property can become your new Mediterranean base.

property_description:

Life in Mahmutlar – A Practical and Comfortable Choice

Mahmutlaris one of Alanya’s fastest-growing neighborhoods, known for its accessibility, international population, and well-developed infrastructure. Positioned between the Taurus Mountains and the sea, it offers a unique combination of natural beauty and urban convenience.

Why Mahmutlar?

property_title: Furnished 2-Room Apartment for sale in Crown City Residence
property_description:
Apartment for Sale in Crown City Residence Avsallar – Furnished and 800m to the Beach

Thisproperty in Alanya, located in the well-knownCrown City Residence Avsallar, presents a comfortable and ready-to-use home ideal for relaxed living or rental income. With a total area of68 m², this fully furnished unit featurestwo rooms, including a separate sleeping area and an open-plan living room with kitchen.

Moreover, the residence offers access to a wide range of amenities, such as indoor and outdoor pools, sauna, fitness center, hammam, and beautifully maintained green areas. Just800 meters from the sea, this home provides the freedom to enjoy nature, daily walks to the beach, and a lifestyle centered on comfort.

Interior Features and Layout

Designed in a modern and minimalist style, the apartment welcomes you with clean lines, bright finishes, and functional furnishings. The space feels open and well-balanced, with thoughtful details throughout.

Main Property Features:

  • Total size:68 m²

  • Rooms:1 sleeping room + 1 open living room with kitchen (2 total)

  • Furnishing:Fully furnished and move-in ready

  • Bathroom:1 fully tiled modern bathroom with shower cabin

  • Balcony:Glass-panel balcony with seating and pool view

  • Air conditioning:Installed in living area and bedroom

  • Light and ventilation:Large sliding doors for natural light

  • Flooring:Glossy ceramic tiles in neutral tones

  • Style:Minimalist with pops of color and high functionality

In addition, the kitchen comes with white cabinets, black countertops, and built-in appliances, including microwave, oven, fridge, and tiled backsplash. The bedroom features a large bed, matching side tables, and a white wardrobe, while the balcony offers a private space for outdoor meals or evening tea.

On-Site Amenities at Crown City Residence

Crown City Residence is known for providing a rich array of communal facilities suitable for all age groups and lifestyles. Residents can enjoy both active and leisure-focused amenities within a secure and maintained environment.

Residence Facilities Include:

  • Outdoor swimming pool and children’s pool

  • Indoor heated pool for winter use

  • Sauna, steam room, and Turkish bath (hammam)

  • Modern gym and sports areas

  • Children’s indoor playroom

  • Lobby, dual elevators, and generator

  • 24/7 camera surveillance and on-site caretaker

Furthermore, the entire complex is designed for comfort and accessibility, offering both practical solutions and relaxing spaces for everyday life.

Discover Avsallar – Relaxation, Nature, and Convenience

Avsallar, a peaceful town on the western side of Alanya, is a favorite among both local families and international homeowners. With its clean beaches, pine forests, and walkable layout, the area delivers a unique blend of coastal living and green surroundings.

Why Live in Avsallar?

  • Short walking distance to all shops and daily needs

  • Sandy and shallow beaches perfect for children

  • Nature paths for hiking and picnics in pine forest areas

  • Diving opportunities in clear Mediterranean waters

  • Frequent public transport to Alanya and Antalya

  • Local markets and restaurants serving traditional cuisine

  • Close proximity to Türkler, Incekum, and Okurcalar for tourism & activities

  • Easy access to aquaparks, ancient ruins, and adventure tours

In addition, Avsallar’s compact structure allows you to live without a car. Almost everything—from groceries to pharmacies—is just a few minutes on foot.

Why This Apartment is a Strong Option

This apartment stands out due to its practical layout, full furnishing, and location within one of Avsallar’s best-equipped complexes. It’s ideal for buyers who value move-in readiness, amenities, and easy access to the beach.

  • Located in a site with full infrastructure

  • 800 meters to the beach

  • Modern kitchen and stylish bathroom

  • Balcony with pool view

  • Suitable for seasonal or long-term rentals

  • Strong value retention in a growing district

Moreover, its neutral design and adaptable layout make it easy to personalize, while the complex’s active management ensures long-term satisfaction.

property_title: 100m to the Sea Apartment in Alanya
property_description:
What would it mean if your daily walk to the beach took less time than making a morning coffee?

In Alanya’s Oba neighborhood, opportunities to live this close to the sea are increasingly rare. Hotels and older developments dominate the shoreline, while new projects usually rise several streets away. Yet here is a home that breaks the pattern: a3 room, 100 m² apartment just 100 meters from the water, fully furnished and ready to move in.

For anyone searching for a property that balances convenience, comfort, and investment sense, this apartment represents a chance to claim both lifestyle and value in one of Alanya’s most desirable areas.

Interiors Prepared for Effortless Living

Stepping inside, the first impression is ease. The apartment comes fully furnished, including all essential white goods, which means new owners can settle in immediately without the hassle of furnishing from scratch.

The living room forms the heart of the home, offering a bright and welcoming space large enough for family gatherings or relaxed evenings. Two bedrooms complete the layout, each with proportions suitable for long-term living or guest accommodation.

The presence of anelectric water heaterensures modern practicality, while neutral finishes provide a versatile backdrop that adapts easily to different décor styles. Whether furnished for a family, a couple, or as a rental unit, the apartment offers flexibility and immediate usability.

Complex Features That Add Everyday Value

Beyond the apartment itself, the residential complex enhances daily life through a mix of social and practical facilities.

  • Swimming Pool– A refreshing retreat during Alanya’s warm summers, right within the complex.

  • Barbecue Area– Perfect for weekend gatherings and informal socializing with neighbors.

  • 24/7 Camera Systems and Caretaker Services– Security and order are maintained around the clock.

  • Parking Spaces– A key convenience for residents with vehicles.

These features transform the property from a simple living space into a lifestyle setting. For families, retirees, or tenants, such amenities create an environment where comfort and safety are a given.

Oba – A Neighborhood Where Life Flows Smoothly

This apartment’s location is not just close to the sea; it is embedded in one of Alanya’s most practical and enjoyable neighborhoods.

Oba is celebrated for its wide sandy beach and pedestrian-friendly promenade lined with palm trees. Here, residents enjoy the freedom to walk or cycle along the coast, stop at a café, or explore weekly street markets that bring the energy of a bazaar into everyday life. Mondays and Thursdays host these colorful markets, where everything from fresh fruit and vegetables to clothing and cosmetics can be found.

Moreover, Oba’s transport links are exceptionally strong. Nearly every bus line connecting Alanya’s neighborhoods passes through Oba, making it effortless to reach the city center or nearby areas like Tosmur, Kestel, and Mahmutlar. Essential services are also at hand, including supermarkets, restaurants of every variety, and Alanya Training and Research Hospital, which is located right in Oba.

In short, living here means combining seaside leisure with practical convenience in a way few other areas manage.

Who Will Find This Apartment Ideal?

Families

The 3 room layout (2 bedrooms + 1 living room) suits small families who want a home by the sea. Proximity to schools, parks, and the hospital adds reassurance, while the beach just steps away makes family outings effortless.

Investors

With Oba’s popularity among both locals and foreigners, rental demand is strong year-round. Holiday visitors value the beach access, while long-term tenants seek Oba’s practicality. Consequently, this apartment offershigh rental potentialin both markets.

Retirees and Expats

For those seeking a peaceful yet connected life by the sea, Oba provides everything needed — healthcare, social opportunities, markets, and reliable transport. The apartment’s fully furnished condition makes the transition simple.

Young Professionals and Digital Nomads

Close to cafés, restaurants, and the city center, this property also appeals to professionals working remotely. Reliable infrastructure and a vibrant local community combine with the calming proximity of the sea.

Investment Perspective – Why This Apartment Holds Value

Properties only 100 meters from the sea are rare in Oba, and this scarcity secures long-term value. When combined with the apartment’sready-to-move condition, furnished status, and on-site amenities, it becomes a particularly attractive rental property.

Buyers also benefit from potential discounts with cash payments, further increasing the financial appeal. With Alanya’s property values consistently rising and demand from international buyers growing, this apartment offers security for today and growth for tomorrow.

Choosing a Partner You Can Trust

Buying property abroad requires more than a good listing — it demands guidance, clarity, and after-sales support. That is where Luxury Estate Turkey distinguishes itself.

  • Clear Guidance from Start to Finish– From your first inquiry to receiving the keys, every step is explained and managed with transparency.

  • Market Expertise– Years of experience in Alanya’s real estate landscape allow us to match buyers with properties that truly fit their goals.

  • Legal and Residency Support– We help navigate paperwork, residence permit applications, and legal procedures with confidence.

  • Tailored Service– Whether your priority is investment, family living, or a holiday home, we align our recommendations with your vision.

  • Ongoing Support– After purchase, we remain available for property management, rental assistance, and resale advice.

For international buyers, we also arrange inspection trips — giving you the chance to experience Oba and view properties in person before making your decision.

This 3 room, 100 m² apartment in Oba combines seafront proximity with practical amenities, offering both lifestyle comfort and investment potential.

Are you ready to live just 100 meters from the Mediterranean? Contact us today to schedule your private viewing and secure this rare opportunity in Oba.

property_title: Yekta Blue 3 Residence Mahmutlar, Alanya – 400m from the Beach
property_description:
Immerse yourself in the ultimate blend of luxury and convenience with this stunning property located in the vibrant neighborhood of Mahmutlar, Alanya. Situated just 400 meters from the pristine beach and a mere 150 meters from top-notch shopping destinations, this property promises an enviable lifestyle. The project is a modern architectural marvel, completed in May 2020, and spans 12 floors of exquisite living spaces.

Key Features:
- State-of-the-art security with advanced camera systems
- Delightful barbecue area perfect for social gatherings
- Entertain in style with billiards and cable TV-satellite options
- Unparalleled concierge service for your every need
- Family-friendly amenities including a children's park, children's room, and pool
- Proximity to the beach ensures endless sun-soaked days
- Stay fit and healthy with a fully-equipped gym and expansive garden
- Backup generator for uninterrupted power supply
- Indoor pool and relaxing room for year-round leisure
- Conveniently located near a bus stop for easy commuting
- Open car park and bicycle parking for hassle-free transportation
- Recreational spaces include a playground, pool, salt room, sauna, spa, steam room, table tennis, and a traditional Turkish bath
- Waterslide and arbor for added fun and relaxation
- Technical service available for maintenance and support

What sets this property apart is its unique combination of luxurious amenities and a prime location that offers the best of both worlds: a tranquil retreat just moments away from the vibrant city of Alanya, 14 km away. Whether you're indulging in the spa or enjoying a family barbecue, every day here feels like a vacation. The lush green areas provide a serene escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life, making it a sanctuary you'll love coming home to.

Don’t miss the opportunity to own a piece of paradise in Mahmutlar. Experience the unparalleled benefits of this property and elevate your lifestyle today. Contact us now to learn more and make this exceptional property your own. Embrace a life of luxury and convenience that awaits you in this spectacular coastal haven.
